channel.title: Comments on: Stupid answers to stupid puzzle interview questions

item.title: By: Shantnu

item.title: By: Fred
item.dc:creator: Fred
item.description: I don't know, but then again I'm not the kind of person to go around touching someone else's balls in the dark. Shouldn't count against me.
item.content:encoded: I don’t know, but then again I’m not the kind of person to go around touching someone else’s balls in the dark. Shouldn’t count against me.

item.title: By: Shantnu

item.title: By: Shantnu
item.dc:creator: Shantnu
item.description: Okay, then smartass. How would you <strong>stop</strong> Mount Fuji from moving? You are not allowed to stop the universe or Earth, before you ask.
item.content:encoded: Okay, then smartass. How would you stop Mount Fuji from moving? You are not allowed to stop the universe or Earth, before you ask.

item.title: By: Fake Name
item.dc:creator: Fake Name
item.description: First of all it's attached to the earth, which is flying through space. But in earth's reference frame, it is on a plate and the plate is moving. But on the plate's reference frame, it is either growing through volcanism or eroding.
item.content:encoded: First of all it’s attached to the earth, which is flying through space. But in earth’s reference frame, it is on a plate and the plate is moving. But on the plate’s reference frame, it is either growing through volcanism or eroding.
